Excruciating Transposition.name: Excruciating Transposition
Excruciating Transposition.flavor: You punish a foe’s ambition by twisting fate so it becomes the target of its own attack.
Excruciating Transposition.trigger: An enemy hits you with an attack.
Excruciating Transposition.attack:
Primary ability + 4 vs. Will
Level 21: Primary ability + 6 vs. Will
Excruciating Transposition.onHit: You and the target teleport to swap positions. The target’s triggering attack deals half damage to you, and the target takes psychic damage equal to half the attack’s damage.

Tangled Fate.name: Tangled Fate
Tangled Fate.flavor: You twist fate’s strings to compel it to serve your interests.
keywords: Ranged 5  Requirement: Your memory of a thousand lifetimes power must be unexpended.  Trigger: You use your memory of a thousand lifetimes power.  Target: One creature  Effect: Roll a d6. The next time the target makes an attack roll, ability check, skill check, or saving throw, you can add or subtract the number to or from the result as a free action.
Tangled Fate.requirement: Your memory of a thousand lifetimes power must be unexpended.
Tangled Fate.trigger: You use your memory of a thousand lifetimes power.
Tangled Fate.effect: Roll a d6. The next time the target makes an attack roll, ability check, skill check, or saving throw, you can add or subtract the number to or from the result as a free action.

Soul Scourge.name: Soul Scourge
Soul Scourge.flavor: You burn the flesh with painful light and scorch the soul with killing darkness.
Soul Scourge.onHit: 1d8 + primary ability modifier radiant damage, and ongoing 10 necrotic damage (save ends).
Soul Scourge.onMiss: Half damage, and ongoing 5 necrotic damage (save ends).
Soul Scourge.effect: Until the end of the encounter, your attacks deal 4 extra necrotic and radiant damage.
